title: Teacher Capacity-Building Course for Inquiry-Based Science Education Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education theories and experience in teaching elementary mathematics
context.additional_context: Teacher training program focusing on inquiry activity design and experimental data analysis using digital devices, developing practical classroom application strategies through project-based learning

learning_goals: Three elementary mathematics-integrated science projects can be developed by applying inquiry-based lesson design principles
Data collection and analysis processes using digital tools (tablets/sensors) can be integrated into science inquiry activities
Teachers' confidence in inquiry-based education can be improved by at least 30% compared to baseline levels
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
